attributes.action: Withdraw support for, and lobby for the deactivation of the Large Hadron Collider (LHC) at Cern
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Messing around with sub atomic particle collision at the speeds approaching the speed of light is not really a good idea.  
If the big bang theory is correct, then the clue is in the words 'big' and 'bang'  .  This is in effect, an experiment, and to experiment with such forces is wrong.   Please close down this experiment.  Much as it is impressive that mankind can create such technology,  it does not necessarily mean it should be implemented.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
